scripts.test:update: npm run build && npm run test:gen
scripts.api:prod: npm run api:extractor && npm run api:post
scripts.api: npm run api:extractor -- --local && npm run api:post
scripts.api:fix: npm run build && npm run api
scripts.bt: npm run encoding:run && npm run clean && npm run build && npm test && npm run lint && npm run api
scripts.bt:prod: npm run encoding:run:prod && npm run clean && npm run build && npm test && npm run lint:prod && npm run api:prod
scripts.next: npm run bt:prod && npm run bump && npm run push && git push && git push --tags
scripts.ci:github: npm run encoding:run:ci && npm run clean && npm run build && npm test && npm run lint:prod && npm run api:prod
scripts.encoding:bc: npm run encoding:build && npm run encoding:copy
scripts.encoding:dirty: npm run encoding:hash:update && npm run encoding:hash:dirty && npm run encoding:source:dirty
scripts.encoding:dirty:ci: npm run encoding:hash:update && npm run encoding:hash:dirty
scripts.encoding:warn: echo Building encoding, to speed this up commit your changes.
scripts.encoding:error: echo Encoding has changes, commit those first. && exit 1
scripts.encoding:run: npm run encoding:dirty || npm run encoding:warn && npm run encoding:bc
scripts.encoding:run:prod: npm run encoding:dirty || npm run encoding:error
scripts.encoding:run:ci: npm run encoding:dirty:ci || npm run encoding:error
scripts.docs:serve: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve --host=localhost
scripts.deps:update:all: npm run encoding:deps:update && npm run deps:update
scripts.deps:audit:all: npm run encoding:audit && npm audit fix
scripts.deps:fix: npm run deps:update:all && npm run deps:audit:all
